hints: A kitchen tool used for blending ingredients smoothly.
Used to incorporate air into mixtures.

To cook food quickly in a small amount of oil.

To cook food in an oven using dry heat.

To cook a liquid just below its boiling point.

To scald food in boiling water then plunge into ice water.
Used to loosen skins from vegetables or nuts.

To partially cook food by boiling it.
Often a preparatory step before another cooking method.

To cook food, especially meat, by prolonged exposure to heat.

To cook meat or vegetables slowly in a covered pot.
Often involves searing the food first.

A culinary knife cut in which food is cut into long thin strips.

Commonly used for carrots or potatoes.
